sense.def:
To divide something
pomeni nekaj razdeliti na dva ali več delov.

seg.quote: ...an attempt to divide the country into two social classes.
The children are divided into three age groups.
The cells begin to divide rapidly.
The houses in Florence St are all divided into flats.

sense.def:
To divide something among a number of people
pomeni vsaki od več oseb dati del nečesa.

seg.quote: The land was divided between the two brothers.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
divides two areas
ali
divides an area into two
, ustvari prepreko ali mejo med dvema območjema.

seg.quote: A line of rocks seemed to divide the cave into two.

sense.def:
Če ljudje
divide over something
, se glede nečesa ne strinjajo.

seg.quote: This question is dividing the people of Wales.
The conference was divided on many issues.

sense.def:
To divide a larger number by a smaller number
pomeni izračunati, kolikokrat gre manjše število v večje število.

A divide
je velika razlika med dvema skupinama.

seg.quote: The divide between rich and poor was great.

sense.def:
To divide something up
pomeni v skupini ljudi nekaj razdeliti.

seg.quote: The proceeds had to be divided up among about four hundred people.
